Title: Mako Tanida (No. 83)
Writer: Jon Bokenkamp (created by), John Eisendrath (teleplay by), Jon Bokenkamp (teleplay by), Patrick Massett (teleplay by), John Zinman (teleplay by), Joe Carnahan (story by), Amanda Kate Shuman (story editor)
Actors: James Spader, Megan Boone, Diego Klattenhoff, Ryan Eggold
Plot: Tom struggles to keep his secret safe. Ressler goes after the man who's taking down his old team one by one, Mako Tanida.
